9. **Highlight key risks and watch signals**: Use bullet points: (i) real‑rate spike >3% → margin compression; (ii) EV credit policy reversal → demand drop; (iii) labor shortage → wage inflation >4%.  
10. **Adjust tone to match multi‑year horizon**: Use “over the next decade” language, avoid short‑term jargon, and frame outcomes in terms of structural shifts (e.g., “the labor‑continuity regime will dominate corporate profitability”).  

Implement these edits to transform the draft into a world‑class, data‑driven, first‑principles analysis that meets the SECTION FOCUS and citation requirements.
